nodes.text: Dewback troopers, also known as Dewback Riders, were sandtroopers who utilized dewbacks as mounts. They used jolts of electricity to control the beast, forcing them to batter down the property of those opposed to the Galactic Empire. In addition, Dewback troopers were known to utilize flamethrowers like the CR-24 Flame Rifle. They could also used T-21 light repeating blaster, or the RT-97C heavy blaster rifle.
